p: DIPs, the proteins having differential interactions, were classified into two groups according to their interaction patterns: (i) DIPs having repressed interactions under tumor condition, and (ii) DIPs having activated interactions under tumor condition. DIPs that were specific to the RCC subtypes and were common in all subtypes were detected for further analyses. The networks consisting of dPPIs and DIPs were visualized through the Cytoscape 3.4.0 [ 13].
